title: Capital One CFPB case dropped after $1 million inauguration donation
summary: After Capitol One donated $1 million to President Trump's inauguration fund, the Trump Administration ended a Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB) case against Capital One involving allegedly misleading consumers about interest payments.
